rooms.description: Art Deco styled entrance hall with decorative moldings and geometric patterns.
Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows offering expansive views of the courtyard and pool.
Formal dining space integrated with kitchen, featuring Art Deco lighting fixtures.
Modern open kitchen with high-end appliances, designed in the Art Deco style.
Master suite with attached bathroom and walk-in closet; features a private balcony overlooking the courtyard.
Guest bedroom designed with ample storage and comfortable seating areas.
Additional guest room for family or visitors, incorporating Vastu-aligned layouts.
Connects the living areas with private rooms; includes built-in Art Deco trim work.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard featuring a small swimming pool, decorative water features, and landscaped greenery adhering to Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: Art Deco themed swimming pool with decorative tiles and elegant lighting.
Private balcony offering panoramic views of the courtyard and pool area.
